name: simple-bank-exercise
description: SimpleBank is a [Truffle](https://www.trufflesuite.com/) project that contains a starter contract, [migration](https://www.trufflesuite.com/docs/truffle/getting-started/running-migrations#migration-files) and [Truffle JavaScript test files](https://www.trufflesuite.com/docs/truffle/testing/writing-tests-in-javascript). In this exercise you are going to implement the SimpleBank.sol contract.
